verses.verse: O sing <S%H7891><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> song <S%H7892><s%>: sing <S%H7891><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, all the earth <S%H776><s%>.
Sing <S%H7891><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, bless <S%H1288><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%>; shew forth <S%H1319><s%> his salvation <S%H3444><s%> from day <S%H3117><s%> to day <S%H3117><s%>.
Declare <S%H5608><s%> his glory <S%H3519><s%> among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, his wonders <S%H6381><s%> among all people <S%H5971><s%>.
For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is great <S%H1419><s%>, and greatly <S%H3966><s%> to be praised <S%H1984><s%>: he is to be feared <S%H3372><s%> above all gods <S%H430><s%>.
For all the gods <S%H430><s%> of the nations <S%H5971><s%> are idols <S%H457><s%>: but the LORD <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%>.
Honour <S%H1935><s%> and majesty <S%H1926><s%> are before <S%H6440><s%> him: strength <S%H5797><s%> and beauty <S%H8597><s%> are in his sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>.
Give <S%H3051><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, O ye kindreds <S%H4940><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, give <S%H3051><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> glory <S%H3519><s%> and strength <S%H5797><s%>.

Give <S%H3051><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> due unto his name <S%H8034><s%>: bring <S%H5375><s%> an offering <S%H4503><s%>, and come <S%H935><s%> into his courts <S%H2691><s%>.
O worship <S%H7812><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in the beauty <S%H1927><s%> of holiness <S%H6944><s%>: fear <S%H2342><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, all the earth <S%H776><s%>.

Say <S%H559><s%> among the heathen <S%H1471><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> reigneth <S%H4427><s%>: the world <S%H8398><s%> also shall be established <S%H3559><s%> that it shall not be moved <S%H4131><s%>: he shall judge <S%H1777><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> righteously <S%H4339><s%>.
Let the heavens <S%H8064><s%> rejoice <S%H8055><s%>, and let the earth <S%H776><s%> be glad <S%H1523><s%>; let the sea <S%H3220><s%> roar <S%H7481><s%>, and the fulness <S%H4393><s%> thereof.
Let the field <S%H7704><s%> be joyful <S%H5937><s%>, and all that is therein: then shall all the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the wood <S%H3293><s%> rejoice <S%H7442><s%>

Before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: for he cometh <S%H935><s%>, for he cometh <S%H935><s%> to judge <S%H8199><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>: he shall judge <S%H8199><s%> the world <S%H8398><s%> with righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, and the people <S%H5971><s%> with his truth <S%H530><s%>.
